method: Preheat the grill to medium heat.
In a small bowl, mix together the garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Rub the spice mixture all over the pork spare ribs.
Place the ribs on the grill and cook for 1 hour, turning occasionally.
Brush the barbecue sauce over the ribs and continue to cook for another 30 minutes.
Remove the ribs from the grill and let them rest for 10 minutes before serving.
